Fly:
FLY METHOD:
GO TO YOUR LEVEL0 AND FIND "GameObject GorillaPlayer".
GO TO THE RIGIDBODY AND CHANGE THE MASS TO 35 AND THE DRAG TO -3.
LongArms:
LONG ARMS METHOD:
IN LEVEL0, FIND "GorillaPlayer" > COPY FIRST PATH ID (Transform) > EDIT LOCAL SCALE TO 1.25
NoName:
NO NAME METHOD:
OPEN METADATA STRING EDITOR
FIND 'BADGORILLA' AND 'gorilla' (EXACT MATCH)
REPLACE THEM WITH '_'
